job description:
Data Scientist
This is an exciting opportunity to join a cutting-edge healthcare company. The ideal candidate is a strong data scientist with a strong grasp on machine learning techniques and strong software development skills preferably with Python or R.
Responsibilities:
  • Build and optimize predictive models using machine learning and other algorithms
  • Build, optimize and quickly decipher patterns within large quantity of data and to reference key characteristics using visualization techniques
  • Experience with predictive models, data-driven analysis and application of machine learning algorithms
  • Write code (Python) to perform online stream processing and offline batch processing from a data lake and relational databases
  • Demonstrating strong programming skills in large-scale data analysis SQL, R & Python
  • Leveraging strong math skills and statistical knowledge to advanced data mining and data analysis activities
  • Present results clearly in written and verbal form
  • Create automated anomaly detection software to constantly track performance
  • Interface with product managers and other business groups to formulate requirements and suggest creative solutions for analytics features and functionality
  • Uphold best practices around development processes, coding, and peer reviews
  • Fully test algorithms and code to ensure the highest level of credibility, reliability, and maintainability
Requirements:
  • Experience developing machine learning algorithms
  • Experience writing code in modern general-purpose programming languages (Python)
  • Well versed manipulating a relational database using SQL
  • Excellent understanding of supervised learning (regression, SVM, neural networks, decision forests, etc.) and unsupervised learning (clustering, PCA, etc.)
  • The ability to adeptly write core Python
  • Strong academic foundation in probability theory, statistics, and applied mathematics
  • Knowledge of software engineering best practices
